# MarketplaceV3EnglishAuctions class

Handles auctions

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class MarketplaceV3EnglishAuctions<TContract extends EnglishAuctionsLogic> implements DetectableFeature
```

**Implements:** DetectableFeature
